Uses of Class
net.kuujo.copycat.log.Log.Builder

  • Packages that use Log.Builder 
    Package Description
    net.kuujo.copycat.log
    This package provides a standalone segmented log for Copycat's Raft implementation.

    • Uses of Log.Builder in net.kuujo.copycat.log

      Methods in net.kuujo.copycat.log that return Log.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Log.Builder Log.builder()
      Returns a new Raft storage builder.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withDirectory(File directory)
      Sets the log directory, returning the builder for method chaining.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withDirectory(String directory)
      Sets the log directory, returning the builder for method chaining.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withMajorCompactionInterval(long compactionInterval)
      Sets the major compaction interval.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withMajorCompactionInterval(long compactionInterval, TimeUnit unit)
      Sets the major compaction interval.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withMaxEntriesPerSegment(int maxEntriesPerSegment)
      Sets the maximum number of allows entries per segment.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withMaxEntrySize(int maxEntrySize)
      Sets the maximum entry size, returning the builder for method chaining.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withMaxSegmentSize(int maxSegmentSize)
      Sets the maximum segment size, returning the builder for method chaining.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withMinorCompactionInterval(long compactionInterval)
      Sets the minor compaction interval.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withMinorCompactionInterval(long compactionInterval, TimeUnit unit)
      Sets the minor compaction interval.
      Log.Builder Log.Builder.withStorageLevel(StorageLevel level)
      Sets the log storage level.
